Crystal Guide

Cleansing

  • Clear Quartz: Cleanse, protect, open
  • Calcite: Cleanse, Perspective
  • Ocean Jasper: Mental clarity, cleansing thoughts
  • Serpentine: Clearning energy
  • Selenite: Cleanse, charge other crystals
  • Prasiolite: Cleanse body
